array.item: Insults my restaurant or another restaurant.
Toxic or unpleasant content.

array.name: rules_items
array.item: The content you are sharing should be food related..
All content on the app is public and can be shared within or outside the network.
Stay kind and respectful to others.
Avoid sharing toxic or unpleasant content
Make sure your content isn’t insulting other foodies or restaurants.
Posts must not contain nudity or any adult content.
Avoid spamming or having duplicate posts.
Stay authentic do not use a fake profile.
